code: import axios from"axios";export default{registerUser:function registerUser(userData){return axios.post("/api/user/register",userData);},loginUser:function loginUser(userData){return axios.post("/api/user/login",userData);},forgot:function forgot(userData){return axios.post("/api/user/forgot",userData);},changePassword:function changePassword(userData){return axios.post("/api/user/changePassword",userData);},verifyEmail:function verifyEmail(userData){return axios.post("/api/user/verifyEmail",userData);},sendVerificationEmail:function sendVerificationEmail(userData){return axios.post("/api/user/sendVerificationEmail",userData);},loadWallet:function loadWallet(userData){return axios.post("/api/user/loadWallet",userData);},getProducts:function getProducts(){return axios.get("/api/products");},placeOrder:function placeOrder(orderData){return axios.post("/api/order/create",orderData);},getOrders:function getOrders(userData){return axios.post("/api/order",userData);},refundOrder:function refundOrder(userData){return axios.post("/api/order/refund",userData);},getCustomers:function getCustomers(userData){return axios.post("/api/user",userData);},getWallet:function getWallet(userData){return axios.post("/api/user/getWallet",userData);},deleteUser:function deleteUser(userData){return axios.post("/api/user/delete",userData);},addBalance:function addBalance(userData){return axios.post("/api/deposit/balance",userData);}};
